link.description: Fighting for power and survival on the world of Necromunda is a non-stop struggle for supremacy. Gangs battle through the claustrophobic warrens of the underhive, in the horrors of the badzones and out in the inhospitable ash wastes, each desperate to prove they are the top dog. The section that follows presents rules for setting up a battlefield to represent either the Underhive or Ash Wastes
